releases.name: v1.7.2
releases.body:
Config Fix

- Fixed default config not generating properly #262

releases.name: v1.7.1
releases.body:
Profile Fix

- Fixed an issue where patching wouldn't work on profiles other than default

releases.name: v1.7.0
releases.body:
Profiles

- Added profiles

Using Profiles

1. Switch to the default profile on the front of Cultivation (so you don't mess up another profile when making a new one)
2. Set your desired settings
3. Open the settings menu and scroll down to the profile section
4. Type a name
5. Click save
6. You'll be switched to the new profile automatically

Switching Profiles

- Select desired profile from drop-down menu above the game/server launch buttons on the front of Cultivation


Once more for the people skimming:
_Switch to default profile before changing settings if you don't want to mess up another profile_


Regarding Issues
If you have any issues make an issue or let me know in the Grasscutter discord. This is a bit messy but it worked well enough in my testing.

releases.name: v1.6.3
releases.body:
AIO Updated

- Updated 6.0 All-in-One to 6.1

releases.name: v1.6.2
releases.body:
Small Update

- Updated patch

releases.name: v1.6.1
releases.body:
AIO Updated
- Updated fork AIO to 6.0

releases.name: v1.6.0
releases.body:
6.0 Patch

- Added 6.0 patch from pmagixc


Please keep in mind you still need a 6.0 server, such as pmagixc's LunaGC_6.0.0, to play on 6.0.

releases.name: v1.5.8
releases.body:
Patch Update

- Replaced individual 5.x patch files with single patch file since it is universal
  - No more need to add patch every update

This has been available for several versions, I was just a bit lazy on updating the handling.

If you still want to use a custom patch file, please use the prior release (1.5.7) and continue naming the individual patch files as expected.

releases.name: v1.5.7
releases.body:
Small Update

- Removed hoyonet patch option since it keeps being misused by people that don't know what it does, leading to issues

If you are the in the very small group of people that needs hoyonet patch for your version, please use a prior release.

releases.name: v1.5.6
releases.body:
AIO Update

- Added 5.4 All-In-One

Updated: Fixed typo in patch name

releases.name: v1.5.5
releases.body:
AIO Updated

- Updated 5.0 AIO to 5.3

releases.name: v1.5.4
releases.body:
XXMI Args Support
- Supports launching XXMI with args: set XXMI in 3dmigoto spot and then set launch args at the bottom of settings
- All launch args will be passed to XXMI when launching like this
- Steps to launch remain the same as with 3dmigoto

releases.name: v1.5.3
releases.body:
Changes

- Added 5.3 patch

Please remember that you still need a matching server version to play on any given game version. A 5.3 game would require a 5.3 server.

releases.name: v1.5.2
releases.body:
Minor Update
- Added 5.2 patch
- Fixed some path stuff for Linux

releases.name: v1.5.1
releases.body:
Merge Update
Massive number of changes merged from Thorny Edition, see https://github.com/NotThorny/Cultivation/compare/1.2.1...1.5.1 for the full detail

This brings Cultivation up to parity with Thorny Edition, including all fixes, updates, and other changes made over the course of 1.2.1 through 1.5.1. 

What's Changed
 Update de.json by @RealShuru in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/199
 Fix Closure Stuff by @NotThorny in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/201
 Settings & QoL Alerts by @NotThorny in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/202
 Fix args in settings by @NotThorny in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/204
 Bugfixes by @NotThorny in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/217
 Add Japanese language support by @daydreamer-json in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/215
 Merge Thorny Edition changes by @NotThorny in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/235

New Contributors
 @RealShuru made their first contribution in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/199
* @daydreamer-json made their first contribution in https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/pull/215

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Grasscutters/Cultivation/compare/v1.2.0-alpha...v1.5.1
Full Thorny Edition Changelog: https://github.com/NotThorny/Cultivation/compare/1.2.1...1.5.1

releases.name: v1.2.0-alpha
releases.body:
Features
 Linux support! Courtesy of @fnr1r 
 Redirect other games using Cultivation (HSR, ZZZ, etc.)
 Extra CLI flags
 Toggle using theme BG

Translations
 Italian translation
 Polish translation
* Spanish translation updates

releases.name: v1.1.1-alpha
releases.body:
Changes

 Updated French translation (@loulou310)
 Add notification regarding unset game paths (@wehigami)
 Fix launching Reshade
 Fix proxy certificate popup not showing up
* Use dynamic resources link, they should always be the absolute latest now (@NotThorny)

releases.name: v1.1.0-alpha
releases.body:
I got bored of the 1.0.XX version numbers so I'm getting funky with it:

Changes
 Add Grasscutter Quest branch download (via @NotThorny)
   This branch is unstable, and a little broken, but should allow you to play through much of the main story!
   The Discord has lots of discussion about this if you are curious
 Fix theme loading
 Minor CSS changes (via @wehigami in #158)
 Closing Cultivation, even without waiting for it to maximize itself, should disconnect the proxy now.
* Various bug fixes and improvement, including many library updates

releases.name: v1.0.27-alpha
releases.body:
Changes
(courtesy of @NotThorny)
 Mod browser loading time significantly improved
   Added search!
   Added pages, instead of one long list, with 50 mods per page
 Fixed cmd not closing properly every time when auto-restarting GC (only applies to Auto MongoDB)

releases.name: v1.0.26-alpha
releases.body:
Changes
 CLI arguments! For those who want to launch from Steam big picture or something.
   View all flags with `cultivation.exe -h`
 Update notifications. Always stay up to date!
 Various fixes

releases.name: v1.0.25-alpha
releases.body:
- Changed encryption button to be a checkbox for clarity
- Added mod downloads to downloads menu, which will show when swag mode is enabled
- Added button to enable delay in 3dmigoto loader, which fixes it not loading properly for some people
- Testing fix for proxy settings not being written for some users (confirmed fix with one user, but since I can't personally recreate it hard to say it's 100% this)
- Fix horny mods being blurred in the installed tab
- Add 7z support for downloads

Resolves #65 
Resolves #82 
Fixes #93 
Fixes #145 

ty @NotThorny

releases.name: v1.0.24-alpha - 3.5 v2
releases.body:
Add option to automatically start and stop MongoDB service with GC
 Automatically restart Grasscutter when changing encryption while it is running
 Prevent running multiple Grasscutters at a time
 AIO download link updates without needing to change the link each time
 Update AIO & resources download to match Grasscutter release 
 Fix bug that prevented 3dmigoto path from being set

(Another PR from @NotThorny)

releases.name: v1.0.22-alpha - Thorny Release
releases.body:
A bunch of changes have been introduced, not by me, but by the wonderful @NotThorny. This should make the 3.5 experience much better.

Changes
 Automatically applies and undoes the RSA patch
 Full offline compatibility
 Fixed 3dmigoto paths being broken
 Fixed "stuck on extracting" issue (can reoccur in special cases)
 Fixed web response checking when offline
 Better default settings
 Added fallback BG for when web is unavailable
 Replace stable downloads with all-in-one 
 Encryption button actually applies to edited 
 Recent commits box shows immediately instead of needing to be clicked 
 Various QoL 
 Added Korean translation thanks to @koreako12
* Some other translation additions (machine translation, feel free to PR fixes)

releases.name: v1.0.10-alpha
releases.body:
Changes
 Fix lacking `wipe_registry` condition
 Update resources download

releases.name: v1.0.9-alpha
releases.body:
Changes:
 Optionally disable NSFW blurs in the mod list (horny mode)
 Force opening as admin (finally). No more non-admin fuckery
 Alert if setting "launcher.exe" as the game executable
 Various bug fixes and improvements

Linux Update
Linux stuff kinda works! By that, I mean you can set the proxy and that's about it. Opening the game isn't supported yet but yknow, it's being worked on here and there.

You will notice linux builds are not here. That's on purpose, you'll want to grab one from the actions tab. They're a bit messed up right now (move the `json`s to a folder named "lang" and the two text files to a folder named "keys"), and don't include libraries or anything, so you probably shouldn't bother using them right now.

releases.name: v1.0.8-alpha
releases.body:
Changes
 Fix extraction (again)
 Add some basic CLI options
   `--no-gui` - Start Cultivation without a GUI
   `--proxy` - Start Cultivation as solely a proxying program. Proxy exits and resets settings automatically on close
   In the future these and more will be usable in tandem with other options like `--launch-game` or whatever I come up with
 Add option to wipe the game registry data upon opening/closing the game. Nice for those who are paranoid, but not at all necessary.

releases.name: v1.0.7-alpha
releases.body:
Changes
 Fix extracting getting stuck
 Fix jar and resource extraction
 Mod section now gets ALL downloads. All of them.
 When setting your Migoto executable, the ini will automatically be setup properly for you.

releases.name: v1.0.6-alpha
releases.body:
Update resources download for 3.0
 Language updates

That's all cry about it.

releases.name: v1.0.5-alpha
releases.body:
BIG FAT UPDATE NO WAYYYY

Features:
 FULL 3DMigoto modding support
   Find the hidden feature (top bar, very center, find the `?`), set your 3DMigoto path, and click the wrench in the top right!
   Manage your currently installed mods (enable and disabled) OR download new ones! They are one-click installs!
 Reshade support
 Revamped extras menu (for launching multiple things at once, you can now run Akebi + Migoto + Reshade all at the same time!)
 A bunch of other stuff I probably forgot about tbh (a new language? I don't even remember but thank you to those who translate!)

Fixes
 Some occurrences of "Could not patch game!" 
 A bunch more

releases.name: v1.0.4-alpha
releases.body:
Added:
 Spanish translation
 Proxy toggle (for filthy Fiddler users)
 Metadata patch toggle (for using versions other than 2.8 wink wink)

Fixes:
 Encryption toggle (thanks to: @ffauzan )
 Metadata checking (thanks to: @ffauzan )
 Code formatting and consistency (thanks to: @Seeker14491 )

Probably some other stuff too idr
